item.title: UUID without dependencies in Go
item.description: Today I realized that size of my vendor/ folder in Golang project is around 150M. I am using glide there. There are 24 dependencies (it’s a program with multiple data storage connectors, notifications, etc.), so I decided to review it and reduce amount of 3rd party libraries. First of all I have checked glide-report and removed 2 unused packages. Go-world has a lot of packages that are awesome and can save your time, but not your program’s performance.
